ar.commentary: In common usage (both before and after pu), "a" and "kin" are separate words, each with their own meaning. In pu, they are considered synonyms.

ca.commentary: Normalment (tant abans com després de pu) "a" i "kin" són paraules separades, cadascuna amb el seu propi significat. En pu, són considerades sinònims.

tok.commentary:
lon tenpo pini tawa pu en tenpo kama tawa pu la jan mute li toki ni: nimi "a" en nimi "kin" li sama ala.
taso: pu li toki ni: nimi "a" en nimi "kin" li sama li nimi "a".
tok.definition: nimi a li mu toki li pana e pilin. ona li lon kama nimi la ona li wawa e pilin nimi.

tr.sp_etymology: ünlem radikali + Latin alfabesi küçük harfi A; radikal noktasız bir ünlem işaretinden (!). karş. o

pu_verbatim.de: NOMEN nichtsüßes Tier; Reptil, Amphibie
pu_verbatim.en: NOUN non-cute animal; reptile, amphibian
pu_verbatim.eo: SUBSTANTIVO reptilio, amfibio
pu_verbatim.fr: NOM animal non-mignon ; reptile, amphibien

ar.commentary: akesi used to mean "non-cute animal," and is defined this way in pu, but this definition has fallen out of use and was later removed in the pu annotations published with ku.
ar.definition: حيوان زاحف، برمائي
ar.sp_etymology: animal radical; pictogram of a lizard. radical represents eyes

ca.commentary: akesi utilitzat per referir-se a "animal no-cute", i és definit d'aquesta manera en pu, però aquesta definició ha entrat en desús i ha sigut eliminada de les anotacions pu publicades amb ku.
ca.definition: rèptil, amfibi, animal escatós, animal que s'arrossega
ca.sp_etymology: animal radical; pictogram of a lizard. radical represents eyes

ceb_l.commentary: akesi used to mean "non-cute animal," and is defined this way in pu, but this definition has fallen out of use and was later removed in the pu annotations published with ku.
ceb_l.definition: reptile, amphibian
ceb_l.sp_etymology: animal radical; pictogram of a lizard. radical represents eyes

cs.commentary: akesi znamenávalo "neroztomilé zvíře" a je tak definováno v pu, ale tahle definice se přestala používat a později byla odstraněna v poznámkách k pu, které byli zveřejněny s ku.
cs.definition: plaz, obojživelník, šupinatý tvor, plazící se tvor
cs.sp_etymology: animal radical; pictogram of a lizard. radical represents eyes

cy.commentary: Roedd akesi yn arfer yn ystod "anifail ddim-ciwt" mewn pu, ond nid ydy'r ystyr hyn yn portreadu'r gair ac wedi ei newid mewn ku.

tkl.sp_etymology: pictogram of a bow and an arrow

tl_l.commentary: In some communities, the usage of "alasa" as a preverb meaning "try to" is equally or even more common than "lukin". In pu, only "lukin"/"oko" has this meaning.
tl_l.definition: pangangaso, huli, hanap, subok, (bago sa pandiwa) susubukang
tl_l.sp_etymology: pictogram of a bow and an arrow

tok.sp_etymology: pictogram of a bow and an arrow

tr.commentary: Bazı topluluklarda "alasa"'nın "denemek" anlamına gelen bir fiilönü olarak kullanımı "lukin" ile eş miktarda veya hatta ondan daha da yaygındır. pu'da sadece "lukin"/"oko" bu anlama sahiptir.
tr.definition: av, avlamak, aramak, denemek; (önfiil) denemek

uk.commentary: У деяких спільнотах, використання «alasa» перед дієсловом у значенні «намагатися» використовується однаково, або навіть частіше ніж «lukin». В pu, тільки «lukin/oko» має це значення.
uk.definition: hunt, forage, search, attempt; (preverb) try to
uk.sp_etymology: піктограма лука і стріли

ur.definition: hunt, forage, search, attempt; (preverb) try to
ur.sp_etymology: pictogram of a bow and an arrow

wuu.commentary: 在一眼社區裏向，擔 「alasa」當作「試試看」个意思搭「lukin」一式一樣甚至講更加常用。在 pu 裏丄，只有得「lukin/oko」 有介意思。

yue.definition: 狩獵，尋食，搜索，嘗試；(動詞前) 試下
yue.sp_etymology: pictogram of a bow and an arrow

zh_hans.commentary: 在一些社区中，alasa 的“尝试”之意和 lukin 等同甚至更加常见。在 pu 中，只有 lukin/oko 有此定义。
zh_hans.definition: 狩猎、搜寻、搜索、尝试；（前动词）尝试、试图

zh_hant.commentary: 在一些社區中，alasa 的「嘗試」之意和 lukin 等同甚至更加常見。在 pu 中，只有 lukin/oko 有此定義。

pu_verbatim.de:
ADJEKTIV alle, jede/r/s; im Überfluss, zahllos, reichlich
NOMEN Überfluss, alles, Leben, Universum
ZAHL 100
pu_verbatim.en:
ADJECTIVE all; abundant, countless, bountiful, every, plentiful
NOUN abundance, everything, life, universe
NUMBER 100
pu_verbatim.eo:
ADJEKTIVO ĉiuj; abunda, nenombrebla, ĉiu
SUBSTANTIVO abundo, ĉio, vivo, universo
NOMBRO 100
pu_verbatim.fr:
ADJECTIF tous, abondants, innombrables
NOM tout, abondance, la vie, l'univers
NOMBRE 100

ar.commentary:
"ali" is an alternative to "ale", coined in a poll in 2002 in order to avoid confusion with "ala". However, the usage of "ale" over "ali" remains more common.
The majority of speakers report not understanding the "abundant, bountiful, plentiful" meaning, at least out of context.
"20, 120" were non-pu meanings previously in use in the community alongside 100; they are virtually unheard of nowadays.
ar.definition: all, every, everything, entirety, universe; (number) one hundred
ar.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

ca.commentary:
"ali" és una alternativa a "ale", creada en una enquesta el 2002 amb l'objectiu d'evitar la confusió amb "ala". Tanmateix, l'ús d'"ale" segueix sent més comú que "ali".
La majoria de parlants diuen que no entenen el significat de "abundant, nombrós", com a mínim fora de context.
"20, 120" eren significats no-pu en ús a la comunitat prèviament a més de "100", però gairebé no s'usen avui en dia.
ca.definition: tot, cada, totalitat, univers; (número) cent
ca.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

cs.commentary:
"ali" je alternativa k "ale", která byla zavedená v anketě v roce 2002, aby se nepletlo se slovem "ala". Nicméně používání "ale" radši než "ali" zůstává častější.
Většina mluvčích uvádí, že nachápou význam "hojné, vydatné" alespoň mimo kontext.
"20, 120" byli ne-pu významy, které byli předem používány v komunitě spolu s "100"; dnes jsou prakticky neslýchané.
cs.definition: vše, každý, všechno, celek, vesmír; (číslovka) sto
cs.sp_etymology: symbol nekonečna (∞)

cy.commentary: Mae "ali" yn air arall am "ale", wedi ei chrau yn 2002 i gael gwared â'r dryswch gyda "ala". Serch hynny, mae "ale" wedi cael ei ddefnyddio yn fwy.
cy.definition: all, every, everything, entirety, universe; (number) one hundred
cy.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

fr.commentary:
« ali » est une alternative à « ale », inventée dans un sondage en 2002 afin d'éviter la confusion avec « ala ». Cependant, l'utilisation de « ale » par rapport à « ali » reste plus fréquente.
La majorité des locuteur·rices disent ne pas comprendre le sens d'« abondant, généreux », du moins hors contexte.
« 20, 120 » étaient des significations non-pu, précédemment utilisées dans la communauté aux côtés de 100 ; elles sont pratiquement inédites aujourd'hui.
fr.definition: tous‧tes, chaque, tout‧e, entier‧e, univers ; (nombre) cent
fr.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

he.commentary:
"ali" היא חלופה ל"ale" שנטבעה בסקר ב2002 כדי להימנע מבלבול עם "ala". אבל, השימוש ב"ale" לעומת "ali" נשאר משמעותית יותר נפוץ.
רוב הדוברים מדווחים שאינם מבינים את המשמעות "נפוץ, שופע", לפחות מחוץ להקשר.
"20, 120" היו משמעויות שאינן בpu, שהיו בשימוש בקהילה לצד 100; הן כמעט ולא קיימות היום.
he.definition: all, every, everything, entirety, universe; (number) one hundred

"ali" är ett alternativ till "ale", myntat i en enkät 2002 för att undvika förvirring med "ala". Användningen av "ale" i stället för "ali" är dock fortfarande vanligare.
Majoriteten av talarna säger att de inte förstår "riklig, överflödig" innebörden, åtminstone utan sammanhang.
"20, 120" var icke-pu betydelser som tidigare användes tillsammans med 100; de är praktiskt taget okända nuförtiden.
sv.definition: allt, alla, varje, helhet, universum; (siffra) ett hundra
sv.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

th.commentary:
"ali" is an alternative to "ale", coined in a poll in 2002 in order to avoid confusion with "ala". However, the usage of "ale" over "ali" remains more common.
The majority of speakers report not understanding the "abundant, bountiful, plentiful" meaning, at least out of context.
"20, 120" were non-pu meanings previously in use in the community alongside 100; they are virtually unheard of nowadays.
th.definition: ทั้งหมด, ทุก, ทุกอย่าง, จักรวาล, หนึ่งร้อย (เลข)
th.sp_etymology: เครื่องหมายอนันต์ (∞)

tok.definition: mi kepeken nimi "ale" la mi poki e ijo. mi poki e ijo seme? ijo ala a la nimi "ale" li poki ala e ona. ijo li lon la nimi "ale" li toki e ona. (ona li nanpa la) ona li toki e nanpa mute mute mute mute mute.
tok.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

tr.commentary:
"ali", bir 2002 anketinde "ala" ile karışıklığı önlemek için "ale"'ye sunulmuş bir alternatiftir. Fakat, "ale"'nin "ale"'ye göre kullanımı daha yaygın olmaktadır.
Konuşanların çoğu "bol, bereketli" anlamını kontekst dışı anlayamadıklarını belirtirler. "20, 120" toplulukça 100 yanısıra kullanılan pu dışı kelimelerdi; şimdilerde bu anlam neredeyse hiç duyulmaz.
tr.definition: hep, tüm, hepsi, herşey, komple, evren; (sayı) yüz

uk.commentary:
«ali» — альтернатива «ale», яка була додана через опитування у 2002 заради уникнення плутанини з «ala». Але використання «ale» залишається більш частішим ніж «ali».
Більшість носіїв заявляють, що вони не розуміють значення «компетентний», як мінімум без контексту.
«20, 120» були визначеннями, які часто використовувались раніше у спільноті, яких нема в pu, але зараз їх практично немає.
uk.definition: all, every, everything, entirety, universe; (number) one hundred
uk.sp_etymology: символ безкінечности (∞)

zh_hans.commentary:
ali 是 ale 的变体词，于 2002 年的一项民意调查创造，以避免与 ala 混淆。然而，ale 依然比 ali 更常用。
大多数说话者宣称（在没有语境下）不明白“众多的、无数的、大量的”之意。
“20、120”是社区曾用的非 pu 定义，现今几乎无人使用。
zh_hans.definition: 所有、一切、全部、万物、宇宙；（数词）一百
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 无限符号（∞）

zh_hant.commentary:
ali 是 ale 的變體詞，於 2002 年的一項調查創造，以避免與 ala 混淆。然而，ale 依然比 ali 更常用。
大多數說話者宣稱（在沒有語境下）不明白「眾多的、無數的、大量的」之意。
「20、120」是社區曾用的非 pu 定義，現今幾乎無人使用。
zh_hant.definition: 所有、一切、全部、萬物、宇宙；（數詞）一百
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 無限符號（∞）

ar.definition: [ شكل اخر من ale ]
ar.sp_etymology: infinity symbol (∞)

zh_hant.definition: [ale 的讀音變體]
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 無限符號（∞）

pu_verbatim.de: ADJEKTIV sich unterwerfend, herunter, bescheiden, demütig, abhängig
pu_verbatim.en: ADJECTIVE bowing down, downward, humble, lowly, dependent
pu_verbatim.eo: ADJEKTIVO klinanta sin, malsupren, humila, modesta, dependa
pu_verbatim.fr: ADJECTIF incliné vers le bas, humble, qui dépend

ar.commentary: In common usage (both before and after pu), "anpa" has the meaning of "place that is down". In pu, "noka" has that meaning instead.
ar.definition: bottom, underside; below, beneath; defeated, humble, lowly
ar.sp_etymology: location radical + "container"; the latter perhaps from a truncated square for a general object (compare sinpin) or a container (compare poki). for the radical, see also how dots are used in blissymbols; compare blissymbol "below"

ca.commentary: En ús comú (tant abans com després de pu), "anpa" té el significat de "lloc que està a sota". A pu, "noka" té aquest significat en lloc d'"anpa".
ca.definition: fons, part de sota; sota, a baix, avall; vençut, modest, humil
ca.sp_etymology: location radical + "container"; the latter perhaps from a truncated square for a general object (compare sinpin) or a container (compare poki). for the radical, see also how dots are used in blissymbols; compare blissymbol "below"

he.commentary: בשימוש נפוץ (גם לפני וגם אחרי pu), ל"anpa" יש את המשמעות "מקום שנמצא למטה". בpu, ל"noka" יש את המשמעות הזו במקום.
he.definition: bottom, underside; below, beneath; defeated, humble, lowly
he.sp_etymology: שורש מיקום + "מיכל"; האחרון אולי מריבוע קטום בשביל אובייקט כללי (להשווה sinpin) או מיכל (להשוואה poki). בשביל השורש, ראו גם איך נקודות משומשת בblissymbols (מערכת כתיבה אידאוגרפית); להשוואה blissymbol "below"

tok.commentary:
lon tenpo pini tawa pu en tenpo kama tawa pu la jan mute li toki ni: nimi "anpa" li sama e nimi "ma anpa".
taso: pu li toki ni: nimi "noka" li sama e nimi "ma anpa".
tok.definition: ijo wan li lon anpa pi ijo ante la, ijo nanpa tu li lon sewi. ante la, ijo wan li anpa tawa ijo ante la ijo nanpa tu li ken lawa e ijo nanpa wan li ken suli tawa ijo nanpa wan.
tok.sp_etymology: location radical + "container"; the latter perhaps from a truncated square for a general object (compare sinpin) or a container (compare poki). for the radical, see also how dots are used in blissymbols; compare blissymbol "below"

tr.commentary: Yaygın kullanımda (pu'dan hem önce hem sonra), "anpa", "altta olan yer" anlamını taşır. pu'da bu tanım "noka" kelimesine aittir.
tr.definition: alt taraf; alt, altında; mağlup, mütevazı, düşük
tr.sp_etymology: konum radikali + "kutu"; ikincisi belki de genel bir cisimi (karş. sinpin) ya da kabı (karş. poki) temsil eden eksik bir kareden. radikal için, blissymbols'da noktaların kullanımına bakınız; karş. blissymbol "below"

uk.commentary: У частому використанні (і до, і після pu), «anpa» має значення «місце знизу». В pu, це визначення має «noka».
uk.definition: bottom, underside; below, beneath; defeated, humble, lowly
uk.sp_etymology: радикал локації + «коробка»

zh_hans.commentary: 在一般使用中（不论 pu 前后），anpa 有“下面地方”之意。在 pu 中，只有 noka 有此定义。
zh_hans.definition: 底部；下面、底下；落败的、卑微的、低下的
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 位置意符 + “容器”；后者疑似来自不完整正方形，表示一般物体（对照 sinpin）或容器（对照 poki）。关于意符，参见布利斯符号中小点的用法；对照布利斯符号“以下”

zh_hant.commentary: 在一般使用中（不論 pu 前後），anpa 有「下面地方」之意。在 pu 中，只有 noka 有此定義。
zh_hant.definition: 底部；下面、底下；落敗的、卑微的、低下的
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 位置意符 + 「容器」；後者疑似來自不完整正方形，表示一般物體（對照 sinpin）或容器（對照 poki）。關於意符，參見布利斯符號中小點的用法；對照布利斯符號「以下」

apeja.author_verbatim: - to single out - expose ; to reveale the guilt or wrongdoing of - to attack non-physically (verbally attack) - to expose to shame blame to fault accuse to cause to feel shame to dishonour, disgrace a painful emotion resulting from an awareness of having done something dishonourable, unworthy, degrading, etc.
creator: jan Sonja

ar.commentary: According to jan Sonja, "apeja" never appeared in any pre-pu toki pona dictionary made by her and never promoted by her, instead it may have been "just an experimental idea in a forum post".
ar.definition: guilt, shame, shun, stigma, disgrace; to accuse, to single out, to expose, to dishonor, to embarrass

ar.commentary: There are various analyses of the syntactic role of "en". Originally intended to be used as "and", it was changed (via poll in 2002) to just be used with "head nouns". One of the more recent analyses (including 2021's April Fools) treats "en" as a subject marker.

ca.commentary: Hi ha hagut diverses anàlisis del paper sintàctic d'"en", Originalment la intenció era que s'usés com a "i" i es va canviar (via enquesta el 2002) perquè s'emprés només amb substantius que són el nucli del sintagma. Una anàlisi més recent (el dia dels innocents del 2021 inclòs) tracta "en" com a marcador de subjecte.

es.commentary: Hay varios análisis del rol sintáctico de "en". El intento original fue para usarlo como "y". Fue cambiado (por una encuesta en 2002) para ser usado con los sustantivos del sujeto. Un análisis más reciente (del Día de las bromas de abril 2021) lo trata como un marcador de sujetos.

fr.commentary: Il existe différentes analyses du rôle syntaxique de « en ». Initialement destiné à être utilisé comme un « et », il a été modifié (via un sondage en 2002) pour n'être utilisé qu'avec des « sujets » (mots précédent « li »). L'une des analyses les plus récentes (y compris le poisson d'avril de 2021) traite « en » comme un marqueur du sujet.

Origineel bedoeld hetzelfde te zijn als de Nederlandse "en", werd het in 2002 na een peiling gewijzigd om enkel bij "hoofdnamen" te passen. th.commentary: There are various analyses of the syntactic role of "en". Originally intended to be used as "and", it was changed (via poll in 2002) to just be used with "head nouns". One of the more recent analyses (including 2021's April Fools) treats "en" as a subject marker.

tr.commentary: "en"'in sentaktik işlevi üzerine farklı analizler bulunmaktadır. İlken "and" olarak kullanılmak üzere türetildi, fakat (bir 2002 anketi yoluyla) sadece "baş isimler"de kullanılacak şekilde değiştirildi. (2021 Bir Nisan dahil) Daha yeni analizlerden birisi de "en"'i bir özne belirteci olarak değerlendirir.
tr.definition: (edat) [birden fazla özneyi ayırır]

uk.commentary: Є декілька різних аналізів синтаксичної ролі слова «en». Спочатку маючи значення «та», роль була змінена через опитування у 2002 для використання лише з іменниками-підметами. Один з нещодавніх аналізів (включаючи 01.04.2021) вважає це слово як маркер підмета.
uk.definition: (particle) [separates multiple subjects]
uk.sp_etymology: від знаку плюса (+)

zh_hans.commentary: en 在句法上的角色是许多分析的主题。它起初与“和”相同，但后来（通过 2002 年的一项调查）变成只适用于“中心名词”。在最近一项分析（包括 2021 年愚人节）中，en 是一个主语标记。
zh_hans.definition: （助词）[置于多个主语之间]
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 来自加号（+）；对照布利斯符号“和”

zh_hant.commentary: en 在句法上的角色是什麼，有各種分析理論。它起初與「和」相同，但後來（通過 2002 年的一項調查）變成只適用於「中心名詞」。在最近一項分析（包括 2021 年愚人節）中，en 是一個主語標記。
zh_hant.definition: （助詞）[置於多個主語之間]
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 來自加號（+）；對照布利斯符號「和」

pl.commentary: Według jan Sonja „esun podał [jej] taksówkarz, który władał językiem z podgrupy akan w Afryce Zachodniej”.

pt.commentary: Segundo jan Sonja, "esun foi dita [a ela] por um taxista que falava uma língua da família acã na África Ocidental".

tok.commentary: jan Sonja li toki e ni: jan li tawa e jan Sonja lon tomo ona tawa. jan li toki e toki pi kulupu Akan. kulupu ni li lon ma Apika pi pini suno. ona li toki e nimi "esun" tawa jan Sonja.
tok.definition: sina pana e ijo tawa mi la mi pana e ijo tawa sina. mi en sina li esun. jan mute li esun lon ma wan la ma ni li esun kin.
tok.sp_etymology: not from a currency symbol (sonja confirmed; said “i think that one is from Mikmaq” but couldn't find a mikmaq symbol similar to it).

tr.commentary: jan Sonja'ya göre "esun" ona Batı Afrika'daki Akan ailesinden bir dili konuşan bir taksi sürücüsü tarafından söylenmiş.

tr.sp_etymology: para birimi sembolünden değil (sonja onayladı; dedi ki "sanırım o Mikmaq'tan" ama benzer bir mikmaq sembolü bulamadı).

uk.commentary: За словами авторки, «esun сказав [до неї] таксист, який говорив мовою з аканської сімʼї у західній Африці».

zh_hans.commentary: 根据索尼娅所述，“esun 是某个出租车司机[和她]说的，而他会说非洲西部的阿肯语系的某个语言”。
zh_hans.definition: 交易、贸易、交换、买、卖；市场、商店、市集、买卖场合
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 并非来自货币符号（索尼娅确认：说过“它好像是来自克马克 [Mikmaq] 的”，但未能找到与之相似的米克马克符号）

zh_hant.commentary: 根據索尼婭所述，「esun 是某個計程車司機[和她]說的，而他會說非洲西部的阿寒語系的某個語言」。
zh_hant.definition: 交易、貿易、交換、買、賣；市場、商店、市集、買賣場合
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 並非來自貨幣符號（索尼婭確認：說過「它好像是來自克馬克 [Mikmaq] 的」，但未能找到與之相似的米克馬克符號）

Lequel de ces deux sens est le plus proéminent est sujet à controverse.

yue.commentary: There are two sides to the concept, "sentient entity" and "homo sapiens", which matters for whether to use the word in edge cases (i.e. aliens, humans turned into werewolves, etc). Which sense is more central to the word remains controversial.
yue.definition: 人
yue.sp_etymology: head radical; pictogram of a person showing the shoulders

zh_hans.commentary: 此概念有两个方面：“有知觉的物体”和“智人”。这个区别对边缘个案来说十分重要（如外星人、变身为狼人的人类等），但关于哪个含义比较重要的问题仍有许多争议。
zh_hans.definition: 人、人类、某人

zh_hans.sp_etymology: 头部意符；人的肩膀的象形

ar.commentary: In post-ku 2021, metaphorical definitions for kili have been suggested, including but not limited to "offspring" and "product", and are moderately popular. It is not yet clear whether this will remain in use long-term.

tr.sp_etymology: bir meyve piktogramı, belki de bir elma

uk.commentary: In post-ku 2021, metaphorical definitions for kili have been suggested, including but not limited to "offspring" and "product", and are moderately popular. It is not yet clear whether this will remain in use long-term.
uk.definition: fruit, vegetable, mushroom
uk.sp_etymology: pictogram of a fruit, perhaps an apple

zh_hans.commentary: 在 2021 年 ku 后时期，有些人提出 kili 的比喻义，包括“子孙”和“产物”，而这种用法也颇受欢迎，但不知它们是否会长期持续下去。
zh_hans.definition: 水果、蔬菜、蘑菇
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 水果（疑似为苹果）的象形

zh_hant.commentary: 在 2021 年 ku 後時期，有些人提出 kili 的比喻義，包括「子孫」和「產物」，而這種用法也頗受歡迎，但不知它們是否會長期持續下去。
zh_hant.definition: 水果、蔬菜、蘑菇
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 水果（疑似為蘋果）的象形

zh_hans.commentary:
康威指约翰·何顿·康威（细胞自动机生命游戏的创作者）。
konwe 的原意不仅限于“生物”和“生命”，它也可用来描述石头、河流等其他死物。
zh_hans.definition: 生命、生气、自主；生物、有机体；活的、有生命的、精力充沛的；使有生气、使活着

康威指約翰·何頓·康威（細胞自動機生命遊戲的創作者）。

zh_hans.commentary: 除了 pu 列出的定义之外，kule 有时也用来指代更广泛的类别，比如种类、味道、性别等。
zh_hans.definition: 颜色、色素、颜料；分类、类别、种类、风格；五颜六色的、多种多样的
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 颜色意符；横线疑似表示“本身概念”的意思，或者为光经过稜鏡的象形（颜色意符）

zh_hant.commentary: 除了 pu 列出的定義之外，kule 有時也用來指代更廣泛的類別，比如種類、味道、性別等。
zh_hant.definition: 顏色、色素、顏料；分類、類別、種類、風格；五顏六色的、多種多樣的
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 顏色意符；橫線疑似表示「本身概念」的意思，或者為光經過稜鏡的象形（顏色意符）

ar.commentary: In common usage (both before and after pu), "lukin" and "oko" are separate words, each with their own meaning. In pu, they are considered synonyms. Those who consider them synonyms typically don't use "oko" at all, preferring "lukin" in all circumstances. The usage of "alasa" as a preverb meaning "try to" is more common than "lukin". In pu, only "lukin" has this meaning. A very common beginner mistake is treating "lukin" as if it means "appearance", due to the mistakenly equating the "visual" meaning as in "pona lukin (visually good)" to mean "looks good".
ar.definition: see, look, view, examine, read, watch; visual; eye, seeing organ; (preverb) try to
ar.sp_etymology: pictogram of an eye. compare blissymbol “eye”

fr.commentary:
Dans l'usage courant (avant et après pu), « lukin » et « oko » sont des mots distincts, chacun avec sa propre signification. Dans pu, ils sont considérés comme des synonymes. Celleux qui les considèrent comme tels ont tendance à ne pas utiliser « oko » du tout, lui préférant « lukin » en toutes circonstances.
L'utilisation de « alasa » comme verbe auxiliaire signifiant « chercher à, essayer de » est plus courant que « lukin ». Dans pu, seul « lukin » a ce sens. 
Une erreur courante chez les débutant·es consiste à utiliser « lukin » comme s'il signifiait « apparence ». Cela vient d'une interprétation erronée de constructions telles que « pona lukin », qui signifie « agréable à la vue » et non « d'apparence agréable ».
fr.definition: voir, regarder, observer, examiner, lire, surveiller ; visuel ; œil, organe de la vision ; (auxiliaire) chercher à, essayer de
fr.sp_etymology: pictogram of an eye. compare blissymbol “eye”

haw.commentary: In common usage (both before and after pu), "lukin" and "oko" are separate words, each with their own meaning. In pu, they are considered synonyms. Those who consider them synonyms typically don't use "oko" at all, preferring "lukin" in all circumstances. The usage of "alasa" as a preverb meaning "try to" is more common than "lukin". In pu, only "lukin" has this meaning. A very common beginner mistake is treating "lukin" as if it means "appearance", due to the mistakenly equating the "visual" meaning as in "pona lukin (visually good)" to mean "looks good".
haw.definition: see, look, view, examine, read, watch; visual; eye, seeing organ; (preverb) try to
haw.sp_etymology: pictogram of an eye. compare blissymbol “eye”

nl.commentary: In algemeen gebruik (zowel voor als na pu), zijn "lukin" en "oko" afzonderlijke woorden, elk met hun eigen betekenis. In pu worden ze beschouwd als synoniemen. Diegenen die ze als synoniemen beschouwen, gebruiken meestal helemaal geen "oko" en verkiezen onder alle omstandigheden "lukin". Het gebruik van "alasa" als voorwoord met betekenis "proberen" is gebruikelijker dan "lukin". In pu heeft alleen "lukin" deze betekenis. Een veelvoorkomde beginnersfout is het behandelen van "lukin" alsof het "uiterlijk" betekent door het fout interpreteren van de uitdrukking "pona lukin (visueel goed)" als "ziet er goed uit".
nl.definition: zien, kijken, onderzoeken, lezen; visueel; oog, zicht; (hulpwerkwoord) proberen
nl.sp_etymology: pictogram van een oog. zie het blissymbool "oog"

nn.sp_etymology: pictogram of an eye. compare blissymbol “eye”

pl.commentary:
W powszechnym użyciu (zarówno przed, jak i po pu) „lukin” i „oko” są odrębne i mają swoje własne znaczenia. W pu uważane są one za synonimy. Osoby uważające je za synonimy zazwyczaj w ogóle nie używają „oko”, woląc „lukin” we wszystkich warunkach.
Używanie „alasa” jako czasownika posiłkowego znaczącego „próbować” jest bardziej powszechne niż z „lukin”. W pu tylko „lukin” ma to znaczenie.
Bardzo częstym błędem dla początkujących jest traktowanie „lukin” tak, jakby znaczyło „wygląd”, błędnie przyrównując znaczenie „wizualny”, np. „pona lukin (dobry wizualnie)”, do „wygląda dobrze”.
pl.definition: widzieć, patrzeć, badać, czytać, oglądać; wizualny; oko, organ widzący; (czasownik posiłkowy) próbować

tok.definition: ijo ni li lon sijelo. selo la ona li ken sike li ken ante. ijo poka li pana e suno la ijo ni li moku e suno la mi sona e lon ijo tan suno ni. mi lukin e ijo.
tok.sp_etymology: pictogram of an eye. compare blissymbol “eye”

tr.commentary: Ortak kullanımlarda (hem pu öncesi hem de sonrası), "lukin" ve "oko" ayrı kelimelerdir, her birinin kendi anlamı vardır. Pu'da, bunlar eş anlamlı olarak kabul edilir. Eş anlamlı olduklarını düşünenler genellikle "oko" kelimesini hiç kullanmazlar, her durumda "lukin" tercih ederler. "Alasa"nın "denemek" anlamında bir ön ek olarak kullanımı, "lukin"den daha yaygındır. Pu'da yalnızca "lukin" bu anlama sahiptir. Çok yaygın bir başlangıç hatası, "lukin" kelimesini "görünüm" anlamında kullanmaktır; çünkü "pona lukin (görsel olarak iyi)" ifadesindeki "görsel" anlamı, "güzel görünüyor" olarak yanlış bir şekilde eşitlenmiştir.
tr.definition: görmek, bakmak, görüntülemek, incelemek, okumek, izlemek; görsel; göz, ​​görme organı; (önfiil) denemek

Those who consider them synonyms typically don't use "oko" at all, preferring "lukin" in all circumstances. The usage of "alasa" as a preverb meaning "try to" is more common than "lukin". In pu, only "lukin" has this meaning. A very common beginner mistake is treating "lukin" as if it means "appearance", due to the mistakenly equating the "visual" meaning as in "pona lukin (visually good)" to mean "looks good".
wuu.definition: see, look, view, examine, read, watch; visual; eye, seeing organ; (preverb) try to
wuu.sp_etymology: pictogram of an eye. compare blissymbol “eye”

In pu, only "lukin" has this meaning. A very common beginner mistake is treating "lukin" as if it means "appearance", due to the mistakenly equating the "visual" meaning as in "pona lukin (visually good)" to mean "looks good".

zh_hans.commentary: 不论 pu 出版前后，说话者一般认为“lukin”和“oko”是意思各异的单词。这两个单词在 pu 中为同义词。说话者将它们视为同义词时，一般不使用“oko”，反而一律使用“lukin”。作前动词“尝试”时，“alasa”比“lukin”更常用。在 pu 中，只有“lukin”有此释义。
zh_hans.definition: 看、见、观察、检视、检查、阅读；视觉的；眼睛、视觉器官；（前动词）尝试、试图
zh_hans.sp_etymology: 眼睛的象形；对照布利斯符号“眼睛”

zh_hant.commentary: 不論 pu 出版前後，說話者一般認為「lukin」和「oko」是意思各異的單詞。這兩個單詞在 pu 中為同義詞。說話者將它們視為同義詞時，一般不使用「oko」，反而一律使用「lukin」。作前動詞「嘗試」時，「alasa」比「lukin」更常用。在 pu 中，只有「lukin」有此釋義。
zh_hant.definition: 看、見、觀察、檢視、檢查、閱讀；視覺的；眼睛、視覺器官；（前動詞）嘗試、試圖
zh_hant.sp_etymology: 眼睛的象形；對照布利斯符號「眼睛」

zh_hans.commentary: 不论 pu 出版前后，说话者一般认为“sin”和“namako”是意思各异的单词。这两个单词在 pu 中为同义词。说话者将它们视为同义词时，一般不使用“namako”，反而一律使用“sin”。
zh_hans.definition: 香料、装饰物；额外的、附加的

zh_hant.commentary: 不論 pu 出版前後，說話者一般認為「sin」和「namako」是意思各異的單詞。這兩個單詞在 pu 中為同義詞。說話者將它們視為同義詞時，一般不使用「namako」，反而一律使用「sin」。
zh_hant.definition: 香料、裝飾物；額外的、附加的

ar.commentary: Mostly used in conversations in English. Likely was popularised by the :nimisin: emote in ma pona, which was originally used to notify Atawan (maintainer of "nimi ale") about newly coined words. In common speech, the meaning got extended to include most or all non-pu words, regardless if they were coined recently or not.
ar.definition: any non-pu word; any new word; any joke word

fr.commentary: Principalement utilisé dans les conversations en anglais. Ce mot a probablement été popularisé par l'emote :nimisin: de ma pona, initialement utilisé pour informer Atawan (qui édite « nimi ale ») des mots nouvellement inventés. Dans le langage courant, le sens a été étendu à la plupart ou à tous les mots non-pu, peu importe s'ils ont été créés récemment ou non.
fr.definition: n'importe quel mot "non-pu" ; néologisme

nl.commentary: Meestal gebruikt in het Engels (of in andere niet-toki pona-talen). Waarschijnlijk populair geworden door de :nimisin: emote in ma pona, die oorspronkelijk gebruikt werd om Atawan (de onderhouden van "nimi ale") te waarschuwen over nieuwe woorden. Bij algemeen gebruik werd de betekenis uitgebreid tot alle niet-pu woorden, onafhankelijk van hoe recent ze zijn.
nl.definition: een niet-pu woord; een nieuw woord; een woord voor de grap

pl.commentary: Głównie używane w rozmowach po angielsku. Zapewne spopularyzowane przez emotikonę :nimisin: w serwerze ma pona, która pierwotnie była używana, aby powiadamiać Atawan (opiekunkę „nimi ale”) o nowo wymyślonych słowach. W mowie powszechnej znaczenie rozszerzono na większość lub wszystkie słowa spoza pu niezależnie od tego, czy wymyślono je niedawno.
pl.definition: jakiekolwiek słowo spoza pu; nowe słowo; słowo żartobliwe

tr.commentary: Genellikle İngilizce konuşmalarda kullanılan bir terimdir. Muhtemelen, "nimi ale"nin bakıcısı olan Atawan'ı yeni türetilen kelimeler hakkında bilgilendirmek için orijinal olarak kullanılan :nimisin: emote'u ile popüler hale gelmiştir. Günlük konuşmada, anlamı, son zamanlarda türetilip türetilmediğine bakılmaksızın, çoğu veya tüm non-pu kelimeleri kapsayacak şekilde genişletilmiştir.
tr.definition: pu kapsamında olmayan herhangi bir kelime; herhangi yeni bir kelime; herhangi bir şaka kelimesi

In common speech, the meaning got extended to include most or all non-pu words, regardless if they were coined recently or not.
yue.definition: any non-pu word; any new word; any joke word

zh_hans.commentary: Mostly used in conversations in English. zh_hans.definition: 任何非 pu 单词；任何新词；任何玩笑单词

ar.commentary: In a 2002 poll, "jalan" was proposed to replace "noka". However, it failed to get enough votes. In pu, "noka" has the meaning of "place that is down". In common usage (both before and after pu), "anpa" has that meaning instead. noka had speculative and/or joking use for numbers, comparable to luka: ten, twenty, negative five.
ar.definition: foot, leg, organ of locomotion; bottom, lower part
ar.sp_etymology: pictogram of a foot with an ankle

nl.commentary: In een peiling uit 2002 werd "jalan" voorgesteld om "noka" te vervangen. Het kreeg echter niet genoeg stemmen. In pu betekent "noka" 'laagliggende plaats'. Bij algemeen gebruik (zowel voor als na pu), neemt "anpa" die betekenis aan. noka had een speculatief/grappend gebruik als een getal, vergelijkbaar met luka: 10, 20, -5.

ar.commentary: In common usage (both before and after pu), "lukin" and "oko" are separate words, each with their own meaning. In pu, they are considered synonyms. Those who consider them synonyms typically don't use "oko" at all, preferring "lukin" in all circumstances, though some speakers do the opposite and use "oko" exclusively instead.
ar.definition: see, look, view, examine, read, watch; visual; eye, seeing organ; (preverb) try to
ar.sp_etymology: eye from a side

fr.commentary:
Dans l'usage courant (avant et après pu), « lukin » et « oko » sont des mots distincts, chacun avec sa propre signification. Dans pu, ils sont considérés comme des synonymes. Celleux qui les considèrent comme tels ont tendance à ne pas utiliser « oko » du tout, lui préférant « lukin » en toutes circonstances.
Cependant, certain·es locuteur·trices adoptent la position inverse et utilisent exclusivement « oko ».
fr.definition: voir, regarder, observer, examiner, lire, surveiller ; visuel ; œil, organe de la vision ; (auxiliaire) chercher à, essayer de
fr.sp_etymology: eye from a side

haw.sp_etymology: eye from a side

Osoby uważające je za synonimy zazwyczaj w ogóle nie używają „oko”, woląc „lukin” we wszystkich warunkach, choć niektóre robią przeciwnie i używają wyłącznie „oko”.

tr.commentary: Yaygın kullanımda (pu'dan önce ve sonra), "lukin" ve "oko" ayrı kelimelerdir, her birinin kendi anlamı vardır. Pu'da, bunlar eş anlamlılar olarak kabul edilir. Eş anlamlı olarak kabul edenler genellikle "oko" kelimesini hiç kullanmaz, her durumda "lukin" tercih ederler. Ancak bazı konuşucular bunun tersini yaparak yalnızca "oko" kullanmayı tercih eder.

hu.sp_etymology: two heart symbols (♡), perhaps to distinguish from pilin. [alternate] pilin with emitters

nl.commentary: Het betekent echt "houden van"/"liefhebben" als werkwoord en niet gewoon "leuk vinden". Het geeft een emotionele verbinding aan, geen voorkeur.
nl.definition: een sterke emotionele band hebben met, bv. affectie, appreciatie, medelijden, respect; platonische, romantische of familiale relaties
nl.sp_etymology: twee hartsymbolen (♡), misschien om het anders te doen zijn dan pilin. [alternatief] pilin met streepjes

pl.commentary: Słowo „kochać” jest czasem używane jak „uwielbiać”, ale w toki ponie „olin” tak nie działa. Wskazuje na emocjonalne połączenie lub więzy, a nie preferencje.
pl.definition: mieć silną więź emocjonalną, np. umiłowanie, uznanie, współczucie, szacunek; relacje platoniczne, romantyczne lub rodzinne
pl.sp_etymology: two heart symbols (♡), perhaps to distinguish from pilin. [alternate] pilin with emitters

tok.commentary: toki Inli li kepeken nimi "love" sama nimi pilin pona mute a. taso toki pona li ante la nimi olin li sama pilin mute lon tenpo mute li sama ala pona anu ike.
tok.definition: mi olin e ijo la mi wile wawa e ni: ona o awen o suwi o pakala ala
tok.sp_etymology: two heart symbols (♡), perhaps to distinguish from pilin. [alternate] pilin with emitters

tr.commentary: Türkçe'de "sevmek" bir şeyi çok beğenme anlamında kullanılabilirken, toki pona dilinde "olin" bu şekilde çalışmaz. Bu, bir duygusal bağlantı veya bağı ifade eder, tercih değil.
tr.definition: güçlü bir duygusal bağa sahip olmak, ör. sevgi, takdir, şefkat, saygı; platonik, romantik veya ailevi ilişkiler
tr.sp_etymology: two heart symbols (♡), perhaps to distinguish from pilin. [alternate] pilin with emitters

zh_hans.sp_etymology: 两个心形（♡），疑似为区分此单词和 pilin

etymology.language: 塞爾維亞-克羅埃西亞語

zh_hant.sp_etymology: 兩個心形（♡），疑似為區分此單詞和 pilin

ar.commentary: Coined by jan Maliku in reference to the message "o moku e kala pona", which jan Sonja wrote on their copy of Toki Pona: The Language of Good during a Texas meetup.
ar.definition: goodbye, farewell, see you later, (literally) "o moku e kala pona" (eat a good fish)

etymology.definition: 'eat a good fish', wishing somebody well

ar.commentary:
More popular than the synonymous (and older) tuli.
san was also part of a set of 10 digit words created by jan Lenoka: lenke, jatu, ini, san, se, nun, loku, take, patu, kajo (0 through 9). All of these coinages except for san lack notability to be included in the main dictionary. They can be found in the sandbox.
ar.definition: (رَقَم) ثلاثة

fr.commentary:
Plus populaire que son synonyme plus ancien « tuli ».
« san » faisait partie d'un ensemble de 10 noms de chiffres créés par jan Lenoka : lenke, jatu, ini, san, se, nun, loku, take, patu, kajo (de 0 à 9). Tous ces mots, à l'exception de « san », manquent de notoriété pour avoir été inclus dans le présent dictionnaire. Ils peuvent être trouvés dans le sandbox.
fr.definition: (nombre) trois

san was also part of a set of 10 digit words created by jan Lenoka: lenke, jatu, ini, san, se, nun, loku, take, patu, kajo (0 through 9). All of these coinages except for san lack notability to be included in the main dictionary. They can be found in the sandbox.
nb.definition: three

nl.commentary:
Populairder dat het (oudere) synoniem tuli.
san was ook een deel van de 10 cijferwoorden die door jan Lenoka zijn gemaakt; lenke, jatu, ini, san, se, nun, loku, take, patu, kajo (0 t/m 9). Al deze woorden, behalve san, zijn niet noemenswaardig genoeg om in het woordenboek opgenomen te worden. Hen kan je vinden in de sandbox.

nn.commentary:
More popular than the synonymous (and older) tuli.
san was also part of a set of 10 digit words created by jan Lenoka: lenke, jatu, ini, san, se, nun, loku, take, patu, kajo (0 through 9). All of these coinages except for san lack notability to be included in the main dictionary. They can be found in the sandbox.

pa.definition: ਤਿੱਨ

pl.commentary:
Bardziej popularne niż (starszy) synonim „tuli”.
„san” było też częścią zestawu 10 słów dla cyfr stworzonych przez jan Lenoka: „lenke”, „jatu”, „ini”, „san”, „se”, „nun”, „loku”, „take”, „patu”, „kajo” (0 do 9). Wszystkie te słowa poza „san” nie są dość istotne dla uwzględnienia w słowniku. Można je znaleźć w piaskownicy.
pl.definition: (liczba) trzy

tr.commentary: Tuli kelimesiyle eş anlamlı olmasına rağmen kelimeden daha eski ve daha popülerdir. "san", jan Lenoka tarafından oluşturulan 10'lu kelime setinin bir parçasıdır: lenke, jatu, ini, san, se, nun, loku, take, patu, kajo (0'dan 9'a kadar sayılar). "San" dışında bu terimlerin hepsi, ana sözlüğe dahil edilmek için yeterli öneme sahip değildir. Bunlar sandbox'ta bulunabilir.
tr.definition: (sayı) üç

zh_hans.commentary:
比（更早出现的）同义词 tuli 常用。
san 也是 jan Lenoka 创作的 10 个数位之一：lenke、jatu、ini、san、se、nun、loku、take、patu、kajo（0 到 9）。除 san 以外，所有单词都不满足词典正文的收录标准，但收录于沙盒。
zh_hans.definition: （数词）三

zh_hant.commentary:
比（更早出現的）同義詞 tuli 常用。
san 也是 jan Lenoka 創作的 10 個數位之一：lenke、jatu、ini、san、se、nun、loku、take、patu、kajo（0 到 9）。除 san 以外，所有單詞都不滿足詞典正文的收錄標準，但收錄於沙盒。
zh_hant.definition: （數詞）三

Diegenen die ze beschouwen als synoniemen, gebruiken "namako" meestal nooit, en geven de voorkeur aan "sin" in alle omstandigheden.

Eş anlamlı olarak kabul edenler genellikle "namako" kelimesini hiç kullanmazlar, her durumda "sin" kelimesini tercih ederler.

yue.definition: new, fresh, update; repeat, do again

zh_hans.commentary: 不论 pu 出版前后，说话者一般认为“sin”和“namako”是意思各异的单词。这两个单词在 pu 中为同义词。说话者将它们视为同义词时，一般不使用“namako”，反而一律使用“sin”。
zh_hans.definition: 新的、新鲜的、更新；重复、再做

zh_hant.commentary: 不論 pu 出版前後，說話者一般認為「sin」和「namako」是意思各異的單詞。這兩個單詞在 pu 中為同義詞。說話者將它們視為同義詞時，一般不使用「namako」，反而一律使用「sin」。
zh_hant.definition: 新的、新鮮的、更新；重複、再做

sutopatikuna.author_verbatim: Dear Sonja, That's a great idea, but if you do so, you need also to add a special word forthe Platypus (Ornithorhynchus anatinus). I would suggest the word "sutopatikuna"from the croatian word Èudnovati kljuna¹. Bonega ideo, sed se vi farus tion, vi devus ankaux aldoni apartan vorton porla Ornitorinko (Ornithorhynchus anatinus). Mi proponus la vorton "sutopatikuna"prenita de la kroatan vorton Èudnovati kljuna¹.:P

wasoweli.author_verbatim: In my Caves of Qud mod, I added toki-pona-speaking bird-beasts who call themselves "wasoweli"; I figured as 'native speakers' they're entitled to a portmanteau noun for themselves, and that's the only intentional artistic liberty I took with the language.
creator: akesi kon Nalasuni
jan Atenaja

ar.commentary: First used as the name for a species in a mod for Caves of Qud created by akesi kon Nalasuni. Later appeared in ku as exclusively part of a translation for "penguin".
ar.definition: animal with qualities of both waso & soweli

ca.commentary: First used as the name for a species in a mod for Caves of Qud created by akesi kon Nalasuni. Later appeared in ku as exclusively part of a translation for "penguin".

pt.commentary: First used as the name for a species in a mod for Caves of Qud created by akesi kon Nalasuni. Later appeared in ku as exclusively part of a translation for "penguin".

ar.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
ar.definition: to use one or more of the "banned" syllables wu, wo, ji, or ti; to break toki pona phonotactics

ca.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
ca.definition: fer servir una o més de les síl·labes "prohibides" ("wu", "wo", "ji" o "ti"); trencar la fonotàctica del toki pona

ceb_l.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.

cs.commentary: Může být bráno ne jako slovo v toki pona, ale jako mimotechnickou pomůcku k zapamatování "zakázaných" slabik. Občas prodlouženo na wuwojitinmanna, aby zahrnovalo zakázané po sobě jdoucí nazální souhlásky.
cs.definition: používat jednu ze "zakázaných" slabik wu, wo, ji, či ti; porušovat zásady fonotaktiky Toki Pona

cy.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
cy.definition: to use one or more of the "banned" syllables wu, wo, ji, or ti; to break toki pona phonotactics

da.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
da.definition: at bruge en eller flere af de "forbudte" stavelser wu, wo, ji eller ti; at bryde toki pona fonotaktikken

de.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
de.definition: to use one or more of the "banned" syllables wu, wo, ji, or ti; to break toki pona phonotactics

el.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
el.definition: Να χρησιμοποιείς μία ή περισσότερες από τις "απαγορευμένες" συλλαβές wu, wo, ji ή ti. που σπάνε την φωνοτακτική της Toki Pona

en.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
en.definition: to use one or more of the "banned" syllables wu, wo, ji, or ti; to break toki pona phonotactics

eo.commentary: Laŭ iuj ĝi ne vere estas tokipona vorto, sed nur memorigilo por la "malpermesitaj" silaboj.
eo.definition: uzi unu el la malpermesitaj silaboj: wu, wo, ji, kaj ti; agi kontraŭ la fonotaksaj reguloj de Tokipono

es.commentary: Puede ser visto no como una palabra en toki pona, sino un instrumento de memorización para referirse a las sílabas "prohibidas". A veces está aumentado a wuwojitinmanna para incluir a las consonantes nasales consecutivas ilegales.
es.definition: usar una de las sílabas "prohibidas": wu, wo, ji y ti; romper las reglas fonotácticas de Toki Pona

fa.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.

fr.commentary: Ce mot n'est parfois pas considéré comme un mot du toki pona, mais comme un moyen mnémotechnique pour se rappeler des syllabes « bannies ». On peut le trouver sous la forme « wuwojitinmanna », qui inclut les groupes consonantiques nasaux interdits.
fr.definition: utiliser une ou plusieurs des syllabes proscrites wu, wo, ji, ti ; ne pas respecter la phonotaxe du toki pona

zh_hans.definition: 使用一个或以上“禁用”音节 wu、wo、ji 或 ti；违反道本语的语音组合法

zh_hant.commentary: May be seen not as a word in toki pona, but as a kind of memorisation tool in English to refer to the "banned" syllables. Occasionally extended to wuwojitinmanna to include the illegal consecutive nasal consonants.
